content.question: What do the authorâ€™s high school friends imply when they speak with him?

choices.label: He seems to have received an excellent college education.
He appears to have found an excellent new job.
He no longer remembers his way around his hometown.
He now speaks a standard variety of Japanese.

content.answer: He now speaks a standard variety of Japanese.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
